Question: In 2004, President **** signed the Kyoto Protocol treaty designed to reduce greenhouse gases.
Hints: This person's domestic policies, especially early in his first presidency, were aimed at creating a strict "vertical of power".
On 12 September 2007, this person dissolved the government upon the request of Prime Minister Mikhail Fradkov.
Anatoly Sobchak was at the time an Assistant Professor and lectured this person's class on Business Law (khozyaystvennoye pravo).
